ðŸŸ¢ The 17 Sustainability Goals (SDGs):
No Poverty
ðŸ‘‰ End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

Zero Hunger
ðŸ‘‰ End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture.

Good Health and Well-being
ðŸ‘‰ Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

Quality Education
ðŸ‘‰ Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning.

Gender Equality
ðŸ‘‰ Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

Clean Water and Sanitation
ðŸ‘‰ Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all.

Affordable and Clean Energy
ðŸ‘‰ Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy.

Decent Work and Economic Growth
ðŸ‘‰ Promote sustained, inclusive economic growth, full and productive employment.

Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure
ðŸ‘‰ Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive industrialization, and foster innovation.

Reduced Inequalities
ðŸ‘‰ Reduce inequality within and among countries.

Sustainable Cities and Communities
ðŸ‘‰ Make cities inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable.

Responsible Consumption and Production
ðŸ‘‰ Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

Climate Action
ðŸ‘‰ Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

Life Below Water
ðŸ‘‰ Conserve and sustainably use oceans, seas, and marine resources.

Life on Land
ðŸ‘‰ Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems.

Peace, Justice, and Strong Institutions
ðŸ‘‰ Promote peaceful societies, provide access to justice, and build effective institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals
ðŸ‘‰ Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.
